title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8154.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8154.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 104
between the Monroe-Wayne county line and the Wayne-Cayuga county line in the

Towns of Ontario, Williamson, Sodus, Huron, Butler and Wolcott, and the Village
of Sodus. (b) Route 31 between the

Monroe-Wayne county line and the Ontario-Wayne county line in the Towns of

Macedon and Palmyra and the Villages of Macedon and Palmyra. (c) [Eff. until June 27, 1990, see also
subd. (c) below.] Route 21. Route 21
between Route 104 and Route 31 in the Towns of Williamson, Marion and Palmyra
and the Village of Palmyra. (c) [Eff. June 27, 1990, see also subd. (c) above.] Route 21. Route 21 between Route
104 and Wayne-Ontario county line in the Towns of Williamson, Marion, Palmyra
and the Village of Palmyra. (d) Route 104A between Route 104 and Keeley Road in the Town of Wolcott and the

Village of Red Creek. (e) Route 414
between the Wayne county line and Route 104 in the Towns of Galen, Rose and

Huron and the Village of Clyde. (f) [Eff. until Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (f) below.] Route 31. Route 31 between Route 414 and
the Wayne-Seneca county line in the Towns of Galen and Savannah and the Village
of Clyde. (f) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (f) above.]
[Repealed]
(g) Route 14. Route 14
between the Wayne-Ontario county line and Canal Street in the Town and Village
of Lyons. (h) [Eff. until Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (h) below.]
Route 31. Route 31 between the Ontario-Wayne county line and Cole Road in the

Towns of Lyons and Arcadia and the Villages of Newark and Lyons. (h) [Eff. Sept. 24, 1997, see also subd. (h) above.] Route 31. Route 31
between the Ontario-Wayne county line and the Wayne-Seneca county line in the

Towns of Arcadia, Lyons, Galen and Savannah, and the Villages of Newark, Lyons
and Clyde. (i) New Hartford Street
between Route 104 and Main Street in the Village of Wolcott and the Town of

Butler. (j) [Eff. until Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (j) below.]
Cole Road. Cole Road between Route 31 and Old Route 31 in the Town of Lyons and
the Village of Lyons. (j) [Eff. Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (j) above.] CR 209 (Macedon Center Road). CR 209 (Macedon Center Road) between

Route 350 and CR 210 (Maple Avenue) in the Towns of Macedon and

Palmyra. (k) Old Route 31. Old

Route 31 between Cole Road and Hills Road in the Town of Lyons and the Village
of Lyons. (l) Hills Road. Hills

Road between Old Route 31 and the Clearplass Containers, Inc., shipping
terminal in the Town of Lyons and the Village of Lyons. (m) [Eff. until Jan. 29, 1992, see also subd. (m) below.] Route 350. Route 350 between Route 31F and Route 441 in the Towns
of Macedon and Walworth. (m) [Eff. Jan. 29, 1992, see also subd. (m) above.] [Repealed]
(n) Route 350. Route 350 from Route 31 to

Route 104 in the Towns of Macedon, Walworth, Ontario and in the Village of

Macedon. (o) [Eff. until April 27, 1994, see also subd. (o) below.] Maple Avenue. Maple Avenue between Route 21
and Division Street, in the Village of Palmyra and Town of Palmyra. (o) [Eff. April 27, 1994 until Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (o) above and below.] Maple Avenue between Route 21 and Division

Street, in the Village of Palmyra and Town of Palmyra. (o) [Eff. Sept. 2, 1998, see also subd. (o)
above.] CR 210 (Maple Avenue). CR 210 (Maple Avenue) between Route 21 and CR
209 (Macedon Center Road) in the Village of Palmyra and Town of

Palmyra. (p) Route 88. Route 88
between Silver Hill Road and Route 104 in the Towns of Arcadia and Sodus, and
the Village of Newark and Sodus. (q) [Eff. until July 11, 2001, see also subd. (q) below.] CR 205A (Gananda Parkway). CR 205A (Gananda Parkway) between Route
441 and Canandaigua Road in the Towns of Walworth and Macedon. (q) [Eff. July 11, 2001, see also subd. (q)
above.] Route 14. Route 14 between Route 104 and Route 31 in the Towns of

Sodus, Lyons and the Village of Lyons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8154.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
